summary: Add another New Armours from other land, far far away.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=yellow]Neo\'s Outlander Armours II[/color][/b]

Author : Neovinci aka Meister

=================================

[youtube]2487UzdGSDY[/youtube]

Add New Armours from other land far far away.

It is new version of \"Neo\'s Outlander Armours\", and closer my original concept than old version.

I add new Gloves, Boots and Helmets for it.

also some meshes are changed to different shapes and colours.

It has both types of armours for male and female, also light and heavy.

It has special version for female only.


-Light version is set as Glass Material.

-Heavy version is set as Ebony Material.

-Special version also set as Glass Material.

-You can craft All Armours.

-All Armours are temperable.

-Be careful, You should to check your characters hair, then choice and overwright optional Helmets.
Extra Hairs by some mods will shown bald head with original helmets.
basically main file include original helmet meshes.

ex) if you use extra hairs for your female character, but not for male, just copy optional female helmet and paste into your data folder.


There is possibility contorted unnaturally with some active poses.

Use 7z tool, Unzip and Drag into DATA folder where your Skyrim is installed.

(..STEAM/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data)


Have a good time.



=================================

[b][color=yellow]Locaton :[/color][/b] In a container, near by hot deck, Riverwood.(as screenshot)

[b][color=yellow]Requirement :[/color][/b] Calientes Female Body for female Armours(CBBE - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666)
[b][color=yellow]Recommend :[/color][/b] Calientes Female Body V3

=========================================================================================

[b][color=yellow]Credit[/color][/b]

thanks to

Betheada for this wonderful land.

Caliente for nice CBBE Female Body

Blender developers

Members of \'NAVER ElderScrolls7\' cafe for useful tips and tutorials

Members of \'Naver Escroll\' cafe

TESNEXUS Staff membership and many Nexus friends 


=========================================================================================

[b]You can do whatever with it for personal usage. 
It\'s not free for other\'s Conversion, neither Upload on any other sites.
Do not upload anywhere include Steam workshop without my Permission.
If You want it, Send A PM or Mail to Me.[/b]
author: Neovinci aka Meister
